items.name: Advanced Deep Mining Ore Scanner
items.description: Locates Deep Ore Deposits within the area that can be mined with a Biofuel Deep-Mining Drill or an Electric Deep-Mining Drill . Unlike the Deep Mining Ore Scanner , the Advanced Deep Mining Ore Scanner can be toggled to detect specific deep ore deposits.

items.name: Battery Powered Lantern
items.description: The Battery Powered Lantern is a portable Handheld Light Source that provides illumination in the surrounding area. Can be equipped in the "L" light slot on the hotbar.

items.name: Biofuel Deep-Mining Drill
items.description: The Biofuel Deep-Mining Drill will mine deep mining ore deposits when supplied with biofuel from a Biofuel Can / MXC Fuel Canister . The Biofuel Deep-Mining Drill has 5 slots and will last 2 hours and 5 minutes on a full Biofuel Can .

items.name: Biofuel Radar
items.description: The Biofuel Radar is used to scan for Exotic / Volatile Raw Exotic deposits. Once activated, aggravated Fauna (varies per region) will attempt to destroy the radar by any means necessary. Radars of all types will show ALL exotic veins on the map in each scan, regardless of whether they have been depleted. Scans performed in an Outpost will not complete as there are no exotic veins in them. This can be used to spawn aggressive wildlife for resources or experience.

items.name: Cave Scanner
items.description: Locates caves with audible beeping. While the cave scanner is equipped and in hand the scanner's lights will blink and it will beep so long as a cave is somewhat nearby. The frequency of blinking/beeping increases as the Prospector approaches a cave. Furthermore, the scanner will beep more rapidly if the Prospector is looking in the direction of a cave.

items.name: Deep Mining Ore Scanner
items.description: Locates Deep Ore Deposits within the area that can be mined with a Biofuel Deep-Mining Drill or an Electric Deep-Mining Drill . Does not indicate the type of deep ore deposit detected, unlike the Advanced Deep Mining Ore Scanner .

items.name: Electric Deep-Mining Drill
items.description: The Electric Deep-Mining Drill will mine Deep Mining Ore Deposits when supplied with 2,000 units of Power . The Electric Deep-Mining Drill has more inventory slots, twenty in all, 15 more slots than its biofuel counterpart. This allows 1000 or 2000 ore to be accumulated before needing to be emptied, depending on the ore type.

items.name: Electric Radar
items.description: The Electric Radar is used to scan for Exotic / Volatile Raw Exotic deposits. Once activated, aggravated Fauna (varies per region) will attempt to destroy the radar by any means necessary. Radars of all types will show ALL exotic veins on the map in each scan, regardless of whether they have been depleted. Scans performed in an Outpost will not complete as there are no exotic veins in them. This can be used to spawn aggressive wildlife for resources or experience.

items.name: IC-001 Radar
items.description: The IC-001 Radar is used to scan for Exotic / Volatile Raw Exotic deposits. Once activated, aggravated Fauna (varies per region) will attempt to destroy the radar by any means necessary. Radars of all types will show ALL exotic veins on the map in each scan, regardless of whether they have been depleted. Scans performed in an Outpost will not complete as there are no exotic veins in them. This can be used to spawn aggressive wildlife for resources or experience.

items.name: Lantern
items.description: Similar to torches, the durability of the Lantern will decrease over time. The Lantern can be repaired (refilled) at a Crafting Bench with 1 Animal Fat . The Lantern will last about 45 minutes when lit before needing repairs. The Lantern allows prospectors to see approximately 10 meters, or 5 standard floor pieces, from their position.

items.name: Wood Rag Torch
items.description: The first available source of Light Source . Can be equipped in the "L" light slot on the hotbar. When lit, the Wood Rag Torch also provides heat in addition to light. The Wood Rag Torch will last about 33 minutes and 20 seconds when lit before extinguishing. The Wood Rag Torch allows prospectors to see approximately 6 meters, or 3 standard floor pieces, from their position.

items.name: Wood Torch
items.description: The Wood Torch is an upgraded handheld Light Source that will last longer than the Wood Rag Torch . Can be equipped in the "L" light slot on the hotbar and provides heat when lit. The Wood Torch will last about 50 minutes when lit before extinguishing. The Wood Torch allows prospectors to see approximately 6 meters, or 3 standard floor pieces, from their position.
